resources.string: Are you a Human or a Character?
Are you a resident of Earth or your imagination? Take the quiz to find out how much human flesh suits you!
1. What do you do in your free time?
Novels, games or movies at home
Household chores, pets, working or studying
Media (News), Technology (Not Entertainment) Teaching or Business
Law Enforcement, Medical, Military or Sports
3. Are you observant of your surroundings or immersed in your own thoughts?
4. Are you an introvert or an extrovert?
Summer, Easter, Thanksgiving or April Fool\'s
National, Labor, Father\'s/Mother\'s or Valentine\'s Day
8. Would you act differently if the world was also different?
9. Which are your favorite school subjects?
10. If you could change the world, how much would you change?
You are completely normal! You know how to play by Earth\'s rules and you don\'t have a problem fitting in. Enjoy life as it is!
You are a normal person! Although your identity is as you thought up to now, there are a few things you would choose to fix about the world if you could.
You are a hybrid! You don\'t belong in only one category and you don\'t have to. Life isn\'t good or bad nor easy to define.
Fortunately or not, \"human\" isn\'t the right identity for you! There is something wrong in this world and you\'d make a great hero in a story!
You are the king/queen of your imagination! If you put your ideas into practice, the world would be a truly unique place to live. Start creating!
